title: Completed PE Summary - Yacht Pinocchio
raw_html:
Category Leisure
Registered Owner & Manager: Mr George Rawls
Flag: UK
Type: Yacht
Length overall: 7.9
Gross tonnage: 0.01
Date & Time 03/06/04 14:28
Location of incident: Strangford harbour area
Incident Type: Accident to Person
Injuries/ fatalities: Owner suffered burns on right arm
Damage/ Pollution: Constructive total loss/ Unknown

Synopsis

While anchored in the Comber River, near Strangford Lough in Northern Ireland the yacht Pinocchio dragged her anchor and her masthead made contact with overhead 11,000 volt power cables. The owner received an electric shock and suffered burns to his right hand and arm. The yacht caught fire and was completely destroyed.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents wrote to the Northern Ireland Electricity Powerteam supporting the actions identified in their internal inquiry into the accident which included promulgating the lessons learned through the electricity supply industry.
